bug.author: Ahill743
bug.description:
Hi, I have finally got to the stage where I can run the DQNcar.py and once it connects to server the car just constently respawns practically everytime it hits the ground. What is the issue? I have had a look into the script but I am struggling to find any answers there or elsewhere online. Pic shows the issue, I do have the same issue on City Environment but cannot get a client server connection on AirSimNH for some reason. Phython 3.5 (cannot get cntk on python 3.7?) AirSim-v.1.2.2 <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/44134102/67970930-c1eac200-fc03-11e9-8527-3ca29fa7394d.jpg></denchmark-link>
------------------------------------ (Remove above before filing the issue) ------------------------------------

comments.comment: This is a separate issue from <denchmark-link:https://github.com/microsoft/AirSim/issues/1009>#1009</denchmark-link> . I am seeing the same behavior with the new \AirSim\PythonClient\reinforcement_learning\dqn_car.py script in the blocks environment. Additional investigation is required here.

After investigating this further, I found that the dqn_car.py script is designed to only work with the AirSimNH/Neighborhood environment. Please see <denchmark-link:https://microsoft.github.io/AirSim/reinforcement_learning/#rl-with-car>here</denchmark-link> for additional details.
